content:
From 18 to 24 March, the units for the demining of the State Special Transport Service found, seized and disposed of 3036 explosive objects.

About thisinformsThe State Special Transport Service, reports the Armyinform.

The territory of 1071.82 ha was checked and checked

  • Kherson - 942,32,
  • Nikolaevskaya - 36,82,
  • Kharkiv - 62.32,
  • Donetsk - 1,40,
  • Chernihiv - 28.96.

In total, from the beginning of large -scale aggression of the Russian Federation, the units of the State Summer Service have discovered, seized and neutralized 126113 explosive objects. The territory of 72086.61 hectares was exchanged (checked).

As reportedArmyinform, for the same period from March 11 to March 17, the DSST units were neutralized by 2907 explosive objects.
title: During the week, DSST units have disposed of more than 3000 explosive items
description: The State Special Transport Service informs about it, reports the Armyinform. ...
author: Army Inform
